text: Castelnuovo Don Bosco, formerly Castelnuovo d'Asti (Piedmontese: Castelneuv d'Ast) is a comune (municipality) in the province of Asti in the Italian region Piedmont, it is about east of Turin and about northwest of Asti. It is on a hill near the confluence of the Nevissano and Bardella. ==References== Category:Settlements in Asti
title: Castelnuovo Don Bosco
